title: Chandbali Earrings - Ruby Drop with Polki Diamonds
materials: 22K Yellow Gold. Central stone is a deep red Ruby with a pear-cut. The earrings are embellished with Polki diamonds

A contemporary spin on the classic chandbali earrings. The top part of the earring features floral details of circular and petal-shaped Polki diamonds.
